channel.title: Homes on Mircea Lungu
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Mircea Lungu

item.description: I am actively recruiting students for the [projects listed below](#projects). If you have other project ideas that are related to my research interests contact me. -- Bio Mircea Lungu is associate professor in the Computer Science department of ITU in Copenhagen. Before moving to Denmark he was assistant professor in Computer Science at the Faculty of Science and Engineering of University of Groningen where he was a member of the SEARCH team and also me in the DSSC pioneers group.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I am currently teaching the following courses at University of Groningen: Introduction to Data Science, Fall 2016 (WMCS16002) Software Engineering I, Spring 2017 (INBSE1-08) Software Engineering II, Spring 2017 (INBSE2-08) In the past I have been involved in teaching a wide variety of computer science courses, including: Concurrent Programming, UI Design, Compiler Construction.
